pkgmetadata.longdescription: Visual Field (VF) Progression Analysis and Plotting Methods // Realization of published methods to analyze visual field (VF) progression. Introduction to the plotting methods (designed by author TE) for VF output visualization. A sample dataset for two eyes, each with 10 follow-ups is included. The VF analysis methods could be found in -- Musch et al. (1999) doi:10.1016/S0161-6420(99)90147-1, Nouri-Mahdavi et at. (2012) doi:10.1167/iovs.11-9021, Schell et at. (2014) doi:10.1016/j.ophtha.2014.02.021, Aptel et al. (2015) doi:10.1111/aos.12788.
